document_title: Menstrual disorders: Causes, signs, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content:
Menstrual disorders are abnormalities in a menstrual cycle, which can be manifested by an unstable number of menstrual days, and the amount of menstrual blood suddenly being more or less than normal cycles. (first)
Doctor Lam Hoang Duy said that menstrual disorders can be a sign of a certain endocrine disease, so women should see a doctor as soon as there are signs to be examined to find the cause. , with timely intervention to avoid dangers to health as well as fertility.
Irregular menstrual cycles, prolonged menstrual periods, more or less menstrual blood than usual... are manifestations of menstrual disorders.
subsection_title: roi loan kinh nguyet.json. What is menstrual disorder?
subsection_data:

Doctor Lam Hoang Duy said that menstrual disorders can be a sign of a certain endocrine disease, so women should see a doctor as soon as there are signs to be examined to find the cause. , with timely intervention to avoid dangers to health as well as fertility.
Irregular menstrual cycles, prolonged menstrual periods, more or less menstrual blood than usual... are manifestations of menstrual disorders.
